communications.name: Bug (Audio)
communications.description: A hidden microphone.
communications.special: Records anything it hears.

communications.name: Bug (Audio or Visual)
communications.description: A hidden camera or microphone.
communications.special: Records anything it sees or hears, but not both.

communications.name: Bug (Audio, Visual or Data)
communications.description: A hidden camera, microphone, or usb-like device. The usb-like version cannot breach computer security on its own, but if a user accesses the computer in the bug's presence, the bug can read its data.
communications.special: Records anything it sees or hears, but not both. Alternatively, it may connect to a computer system and search and copy data from it.

communications.name: Bug (Audio/Visual/Data)
communications.description: A hidden camera, microphone, and usb-like device. The usb-like version cannot breach computer security on its own, but if a user accesses the computer in the bug's presence, the bug can read its data.
communications.special: Records anything it sees or hears, and is also able to connect to a computer system and search and copy data from it.

communications.name: Bug (Audio/Visual/Data/Bioscan)
communications.description: A hidden camera, microphone, usb-like device, and bioscanner. The usb-like version cannot breach computer security on its own, but if a user accesses the computer in the bug's presence, the bug can read its data. The bioscanner can sample an area for DNA traces, chemical taint, and so forth.
communications.special: Records anything it sees or hears, and is also able to connect to a computer system and search and copy data from it. It is also able to scan for biological material in the area.

communications.name: Bug (Audio/Visual/Data/Bioscan)
communications.description: A hidden camera, microphone, usb-like device, and bioscanner. The usb-like version cannot breach computer security on its own, but if a user accesses the computer in the bug's presence, the bug can read its data. The bioscanner can sample an area for DNA traces, chemical taint, and so forth.
communications.special: Records anything it sees or hears, and is also able to connect to a computer system and search and copy data from it. It is also able to scan for biological material in the area. Also comes equipped with an onboard computer rated at computer/1.

communications.name: Commdot
communications.description: A commdot is a tiny microphone/speaker and transmitter, ranging in size between a few centimeters and a few millimeters across. A commdot is capable of interfacing with another communications device and relaying messages back and forth. Commdots have a range of only a few meters and are usually used as hands-free communicators, but can also be used as improvised bugs or throat microphones.
communications.special: Can be used to interface with other communications devices and relay messages back and forth.

communications.name: Holographic Projector
communications.description: This holographic projector is a briefcase-sized box that, when activated, creates a three-dimensional image in the space around it, to a range of around three meters. The projected images are obviously not real and most often are used for communication purposes. A holographic projector can be connected to any computer, comm unit, or transceiver of TL-10 or more.
communications.special: Creates obviously fake 3D images up to three meters around it.

communications.name: Holographic Projector
communications.description: This holographic projector is a laptop sized box that, when activated, creates a three-dimensional image in the space around it, to a range of around three meters. The projected images can be realistic enough to fool anyone who fails an INT check. A holographic projector can be connected to any computer, comm unit, or transceiver of TL-10 or more.
communications.special: Creates realistic 3D images up to three meters around it, able to fool anyone who fails an INT check.

communications.name: Holographic Projector
communications.description: This holographic projector is a tissue-box-sized mechanism that, when activated, creates a three-dimensional image in the space around it, to a range of around three meters. The projected images can be true-to-life enough to fool anyone who doesn't touch them. A holographic projector can be connected to any computer, comm unit, or transceiver of TL-10 or more.
communications.special: Creates true-to-life 3D images up to three meters around it.

communications.name: Holographic Projector
communications.description: This holographic projector is a very small device that, when activated, creates a three-dimensional image in the space around it, to a range of around three meters. The projected images can be true-to-life enough to fool anyone who doesn't touch them. A holographic projector can be connected to any computer, comm unit, or transceiver of TL-10 or more.
communications.special: Creates true-to-life 3D images up to three meters around it.

communications.name: Mobile Comm (Audio)
communications.description: A mobile comm unit is a portable telecommunications device. In today's world we call them mobile phones or cell phones. Using physical controls and a screen, can connect to planet-wide comm networks allowing the user to send and receive audio anywhere.
communications.special: Connects to planet-wide comm networks allowing the user to send and receive audio anywhere.

communications.name: Mobile Comm (Audio-Visual)
communications.description: A mobile comm unit is a portable telecommunications device. In today's world we call them mobile phones or cell phones. Using a touch screen, it can connect to planet-wide comm networks allowing the user to send and receive audio and video anywhere.
communications.special: Connects to planet-wide comm networks allowing the user to send and receive audio and video anywhere.

communications.name: Mobile Comm (Data)
communications.description: A mobile comm unit is a portable telecommunications device. In today's world we call them mobile phones or cell phones. Using a projector, a fold-out screen, or connecting to cybernetics, it can connect to planet-wide comm networks allowing the user to send and receive audio, video, and other data anywhere.
communications.special: Connects to planet-wide comm networks allowing the user to send and receive audio, video, and other data anywhere.

communications.name: Radio Transceiver
communications.description: A transceiver is a stand-alone communications device, what today we would call a two-way radio. Unlike a mobile comm, which relies on the presence of an established communications network, a transceiver can send and receive directly under its own power. Most transceivers are radio or laser-based.
communications.special: Able to send and receive audio to a Distant (5km) range.

communications.name: Radio Transceiver
communications.description: A transceiver is a stand-alone communications device, what today we would call a two-way radio. Unlike a mobile comm, which relies on the presence of an established communications network, a transceiver can send and receive directly under its own power. Most transceivers are radio or laser-based.
communications.special: Able to send and receive audio to a Very Distant (50km) range.

communications.name: Radio Transceiver
communications.description: A transceiver is a stand-alone communications device, what today we would call a two-way radio. Unlike a mobile comm, which relies on the presence of an established communications network, a transceiver can send and receive directly under its own power. Most transceivers are radio or laser-based.
communications.special: Able to send and receive audio to a Regional (500km) or Orbital (500km) range.

communications.name: Radio Transceiver
